job description:
This is an excellent position for a Junior Healthcare Data Analyst to work in a unique and dynamic environment where we support the Defense Health Agency (DHA) Connected Health Branch headquartered on Join Base Lewis-McChord with a mission to promote cutting-edge approaches for the use of connected health technology to identify, treat and minimize/eliminate the short-and long-term effects of debilitating health conditions on military readiness.
  • Perform data analysis, research and data manipulation tasks
  • Perform queries and interpret business data requests to create efficient queries
  • Extract and analyze raw data
  • Organize data into presentable formats
ASRC Federal and its Subsidiaries are Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employers. All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, gender, color, age, sexual orientation, gender identification, national origin, religion, marital status, ancestry, citizenship, disability, protected veteran status or any other factor prohibited by applicable law.
